description:
Near Field Communication has taken the world by storm, and is an effective method of contactless transactions, data exchange, and connections made using NFC devices.

Near Field Communication (NFC) allows for simplified transactions, data exchange, and connections with a touch. NFC can share a contact, photo, song, application, video, or pair Bluetooth devices.

This course will begin with discussions on the history, technical growth, and progression of mobile phones. The succeeding modules will discuss the definition, capabilities, benefits, and the different uses of Near Field Communication.
title: Near Field Communication
